video_prompt: **A glowing, three-dimensional "civiti" with gold filigree and blue light outlines emerges, accompanied by small golden tree emblems. A floating light-grey gear ring with integrated smaller gears and pulsing blue central lights rotates, as blue light beams extend and connect elements. A shimmering "C29" with internal reflections and a golden "2" appears, with a blue light beam emanating downwards to a bright point. A dark green olive branch gracefully glides into the foreground, while the dark pixelated background subtly shifts and ripples with vertical light lines.**
image_prompt: Generate a vertical image with a dark, tech-inspired background, exuding sophistication and innovation. Prominently feature "civiti" in a glowing blue, gold-leafed 3D font with small golden tree emblems above the "i"s. Below, an ethereal light-grey gear ring floats with smaller gears, some containing blue play buttons, connected by vertical blue light beams. Centered below is "C29" in a similar glowing, translucent style, with a golden "2" and a tree emblem above the "C". A bold blue light beam extends from the "9" to a bright point source at the bottom. A dark green olive branch rests on a reflective surface at the base. The background has subtle pixelated textures and light lines.
refined_video_prompt: A glowing "civiti" with gold filigree and blue light outlines emerges, accompanied by small golden tree emblems appearing. A floating gear ring with pulsing blue central lights rotates, as blue light beams extend and connect elements. A shimmering "C29" with a golden "2" appears, emanating a blue light beam downwards to a point. A dark green olive branch gracefully glides into the foreground, while the dark pixelated background subtly shifts and ripples with vertical light lines.
